privacyComplianceList: In India, we currently do not have any legislation on Privacy Law but we are adhering to the standards followed for data privacy across the globe.
locIntlComplianceList: We are currently complying with collection of non-personal data as per global security norms such as Global data protection regulation (GDPR).

preventHarm.additionalInfoMechanismProcessesPolicies: We are proposing to thoroughly validate our solution to mitigate any such effects.

typesOfDataCollected: We are collecting date and place of birth of a baby/infant and no other information that can be linked or identified to the person.
dataPrivacySecurity.privacySecurityDescription: We are collecting anonymized data (clinical data of patients) with prior approvals and clearances from hospitals.

inappropriateIllegalContent.illegalContentDetectionMechanism: This project does not collect, store or distribute content
